title: Organizational Learning and Stakeholder Sentiment Analysis: A Mathematics-Based Case Study via Mixed Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and data interpretation skills, understanding of social media platforms
context.additional_context: Case study-based education combining organizational learning theory and emotion analysis in mathematics, optimized for smartphone-based microlearning

learning_goals: Development of the ability to mathematically interpret sentiment analysis results derived from social media data
Cultivation of the ability to conduct case study projects applying mixed methodologies (quantitative + qualitative)
Strengthening the ability to design mathematical models that integrate stakeholder feedback into organizational learning processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
